extends AeSOAPInvoker

addOperationToCall

protected void addOperationToCall(AeInvokeContext aContext,
                                  org.apache.axis.constants.Use aUseFlag)
Sets the operation descriptor for the call. Note copied from service handler setup, since it couldn't be reused with its arguments.

Parameters:
aContext - The context for the invoke
aUseFlag - Either Use.ENCODED or Use.LITERAL or null, if null we default to encoded.

addParamsToOperation

protected void addParamsToOperation(org.apache.axis.description.OperationDesc aOperation,
                                    AeInvokeContext aContext,
                                    boolean aIsInput)
Adds all parameters for the given message to the given operation. Note copied from service handler setup, since it couldn't be reused with its arguments.

Parameters:
aOperation - The operation we will be adding parameters for
aContext - The context for the invoke
aIsInput - flag indicating if this is an input message (true)

setupOperationQName

protected void setupOperationQName(AeInvokeContext aContext)
Setup the correct invoke operation qname if described in input binding.

Parameters:
aContext - context for the invoke
